title: How to Change Your Phone Number on WeChat on Android

steps.title: Open WeChat.
steps.content: Open WeChat. It’s the green icon with two speech bubbles labeled “WeChat.” You’ll usually find it on the home screen or in the app drawer.

steps.title: Tap Me.
steps.content: Tap Me . It’s at the bottom-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Phone.
steps.content: Tap Phone . The "Link Mobile" screen will appear, displaying your current phone number.

steps.title: Enter the new phone number.
steps.content: Enter the new phone number. The country code is already filled in, so you’ll just need to type the rest of the phone number.

steps.title: Tap Next.
steps.content: Tap Next . It’s at the top-right corner of the screen. This sends a verification code to the number you entered.

steps.title: Enter the verification code.
steps.content: Enter the verification code. You can type it into the blank under “Enter code.” If you don’t receive the verification code after several minutes, tap Verify via Phone Call to get it over the phone.

steps.title: Tap Next.
steps.content: Tap Next . Your new phone number is now connected to WeChat.
